communityDescription: GDG is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.

venue.address: Hotel Padmaja Premium Bhubaneswar, Chandrasekharpur Branch

description.short: The Cloud Community Day is a flagship event hosted by Google Developer Groups (GDG), focusing on cloud technologies and related innovations. It typically brings together cloud enthusiasts, developers, tech professionals, and companies to share insights, trends, and advancements in cloud computing.
description.long: The Cloud Community Day is a flagship event hosted by Google Developer Groups (GDG), focusing on cloud technologies and related innovations. It typically brings together cloud enthusiasts, developers, tech professionals, and companies to share insights, trends, and advancements in cloud computing.GDGs across various cities host *Cloud Community Day*, making it a global phenomenon with local impacts. It provides a space for cloud enthusiasts to stay updated with the latest innovations and connect with the broader Google Cloud ecosystem.

whatToExpect.title: Expert Talks and Panels
whatToExpect.description: Sessions led by Google Cloud experts & industry leaders strengthening the cloud community by encouraging knowledge sharing and collaboration.

whatToExpect.title: Workshops and Demos
whatToExpect.description: Hands-on workshops and live demonstrations of cloud products and services, giving participants a chance to experience cloud tools in action.

whatToExpect.title: Networking Opportunities
whatToExpect.description: A platform for attendees to connect with peers, cloud experts, and potential employers, fostering collaboration within the tech community.

pastDevFest.summery: With 5 expert speakers from around the globe and 300+ enthusiastic attendees, the event truly transformed into a tech hub. From insightful sessions on cloud innovations to meaningful networking opportunities, participants gained valuable knowledge and connections. The energy in the room was contagious, as everyone shared their passion for cloud technologies. It was more than just talks—hands-on experiences, collaborative discussions, and new ideas emerged, making this edition a massive success. We look forward to host more groundbreaking events like this!

seo.keywords: GDG, Cloud Community Day, Google, CCD
